root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 13-a-1, translated into en
root.data:
There isn’t a formal set of instructions that would directly assign responsibility to an organisation for collection, processing, and dissemination of statistics for this indicator. However, the UNFCCC secretariat was requested by the COP 17 to prepare compilation and synthesis reports on the information reported by Parties in their BRs.[4]

4

Available at: https://unfccc.int/process-and-meetings/transparency-and-reporting/reporting-and-review-under-the-convention/national-communications-and-biennial-reports-annex-i-parties/compilation-and-synthesis-reports/compilation-and-synthesis-reports-of-parties-included-in-annex-i-to#eq-1 ↑
